author: Virginia Woolf
quote: I would venture to guess that Anon, who wrote so many poems without signing them, was often a woman.

author: Jane Austen
quote: A lady's imagination is very rapid; it jumps from admiration to love, from love to matrimony in a moment.

author: Charlotte BrontÃ«
quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will.

author: Leila Khaled
quote: I have learned that a woman can be a fighter, a freedom fighter, a political activist, and that she can fall in love, and be loved, she can be married have children be a mother... Revolution must mean life also. Every aspect of life.
